body.p:
Collection House of MORGAN, HANSON & Co.,
N. E. corner Dock and Walnut Streets, Philadelphia.
Notes and Drafts collected in all parts of North America through Banks and Bankers.
Particular attention given to the Collection of past due claims through Attorneys.
Dishonored paper transferred to our Attorneys on day of dishonor when desired.
Philadelphia, October 31st 1862
James W. Tate Esq.
Assis't. Secy of State
Louisville Ky.
Sir:
I have the honour to acknowledge the receipt of your favour of Sept. 29th together with Commission from the Governor. Absence from the City prevented my replying in due season.
In compliance with the directions forwarded. I herewith enclose my affidavit oath. certified to by a Justice of the Peace for this County. Also impression of seal.

Will you have the further kindness to inform me. if upon receipt of the Enclosed
all the Steps will have been taken necessary to you an instrument attested by me & to be used in the State of Kentucky. full force and effect?

Very Respectfully
Your Obd't. Serv't.
Theodore M Morgan
